info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Middlesex and north central New Haven Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prospect, or near Naugatuck, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Naugatuck, Wolcott, Hamden, Cheshire, Seymour, Cromwell, Portland, Prospect, Woodbridge, Beacon Falls and Bethany. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut.
